## Familiarize yourself with the movement

Read both the open letter and statement of demands listed below. 

- [Open Letter to Bicollege Community](https://docs.google.com/document/d/15ZIi4QtlyU5C9mVP1heyBD7rrI44k_F1nUbjHYhvR_o/edit?usp=sharing)

- [Statement of Demands](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1u3kg_XDs5ZHH4ma_hL0rlEn5SrQdfbHT9tRh8UE1zcY/edit?usp=sharing)


Once you've read these articles, take the comprehension quiz for class 18 on Moodle as you would normally. 


- You can see a Swarthmore Voices post on the strike [here](https://swarthmorevoices.com/content-1/2020/11/4/general-strike-at-haverford-college).
